EmailTemplate.description: Sent to new hires to their WEX email addresses
EmailTemplate.name: CS New Hire Employee Number
EmailTemplate.subject: WEX Employee Number
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi insert employee's name,
Your employee number is xxxxxx. Please keep it in a location you can access it if you are locked out of your computer. The IT/System Access team may ask for it if you need a reset at any point.
Thank you,
Elaine
